scripts.build: npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp src/popup.html src/popup.js dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./manifest.json').version") && zip -r "releases/reddit-filter-addon-v$VERSION.zip" manifest.json dist/ icons/ -x '*.DS_Store' '**/node_modules/*' '**/.git/*'
scripts.package:source: VERSION=$(node -p "require('./manifest.json').version") && echo 'test' > default_keywords.txt && echo 'test' > default_subreddits.txt && zip -r "releases/reddit-filter-source-v$VERSION.zip" README.md package.json package-lock.json src/ manifest.json webpack.config.js tsconfig.json icons/ build.sh default_keywords.txt default_subreddits.txt -x '*.DS_Store' '**/node_modules/*' '**/.git/*' '**/dist/*' '**/releases/*' && rm -f default_keywords.txt default_subreddits.txt
